attributes.action: Give us the right to choose whether we agree with the New National NHS Scheme.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/health/11790711/Boots-Tesco-and-Superdrug-to-get-access-to-NHS-medical-records.html

Those who we're aware of this new scheme and wanted to opt out were completely disregarded. 

http://www.theguardian.com/society/2015/jan/22/nhs-disregards-patients-requests-sharing-medical-records

The government should allow the people to decide whether they want to be apart of this scheme or not.
attributes.background: Today was the first time many had even heard of the new national scheme to share NHS private medical records with high street pharmacies. This was never open to public debate. I don't want my private records (that are difficult for me to even access) to be share with anyone other than my GP.
